title: Pre-Game Skin Purchasing
body: I miss the old days where you could buy a skin during champ select. When the new que method was introduced and the new champ select, the ability to do this was taken away. I am not really sure why. I know there have been many times where either I, or another player has made the comment "Darn! I forgot to buy the skin for the champ I was gonna play."  I know this isn't a big issue, and could easily be left out, but I liked being able to do this. This may be something that has been brought up before, and if so I am sorry for creating a new thread on it.

replies.body: Agreed! We're looking forward to bringing this back in the new client :)

Thank you for the reply. I have never really posted before and I am glad to see even a low upvoted thread is seen by riot. :)

Is there not a concern that enabling in-champ-select purchases may negatively affect games by causing players' attention to be diverted away from ensuring they have the correct runes, spells, masteries?

We also have to be able to purchase RP pre-game, a pre-game gift option could work too. Where you could purchase a champion for someone that you are duoing with so that they can lock your champ and trade but don't have that champ yet.
A little forethought usually doesn't hurt anyone

I agree. However, it was a very nice feature when it was around.

.... at least for people like me who impulse buy on things like what the other champ colors are lol.
+1 , would love to buy impulsively more.
